Title.text: Christian Crusade litter bag, front

Description.text: The message of on the front of the bag reads: “As you deposit your trash / in this handy litter bag, remember . . . / as this trash would deface / the countryside, / godless communism would permanently / deface America— / annihilate Christianity— / and enslave your children.”
